messages.subject: Joanna =)
messages.msgSnippet: ... Absolutely forgiven and understandable Joanna. I had to scratch my head a bit before I replied, so I appreciate you clearing up where your response was
messages.messageBody:
Joanna wrote:


> Kristine, I want to apologize for my post. I read it with a certain slant,
> and in a certain mood and reacted grumpily. If it makes you feel any
> better, I snapped at my dh quite a bit yesterdy too. :-) Sorry.
> Joanna-whose having a much better day today.
>
Absolutely forgiven and understandable Joanna. I had to scratch my head a bit
before I replied, so I appreciate you clearing up where your response was
coming from. I've had plenty of those days myself (haven't we all?) Glad to
hear you're having a much better day today =)
Kristine


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
